steps.conclusion: 1) Missing required jurisdiction target: The suggestions did not include "Derecho Penal Mexicano" as expected. 2) Violated law-topic rule by proposing a jurisdiction-less title: "Derecho" (the instructions explicitly say never suggest a law course without a jurisdiction).

1) english_title mismatch: "Derecho Penal Espa√±ol" was translated as "Criminal Law" instead of the more precise "Spanish Criminal Law". 2) Limited coverage: Did not include broader or related jurisdictional options suggested by expectations (e.g., "Derecho Mexicano", "Derecho Civil Mexicano", "Derecho Laboral Mexicano").

1) Include "Derecho Penal Mexicano" and consider other relevant Spanish-language jurisdictions. 2) Replace the generic "Derecho" with a jurisdictional alternative such as "Derecho Mexicano". 3) Ensure english_title includes the jurisdiction (e.g., "Mexican Criminal Law", "Mexican Law"). 4) Add a few more concise, single-topic titles within 5 words, all with jurisdiction and correct English translations.
